Header: One More Lecture Delivered at Wanni HQ
Content: Directorate of Psychological Operations continuing their educative projects had one more lecture session conducted for Army personnel on ‘Better family life through attitude development’ at the Security Force Headquarters - Wanni (SFHQ-W) on Saturday (7). The lecture was conducted by Lieutenant Colonel B.G.S Samanthi of National Cadet Corps at the invitation of the Directorate of Psychological Operations. More than 100 Army personnel attended the lecture session.
